name: BattleTime Conquest
description:
OVER 100 FAST BREATHTAKING BATTLES ARE WAITING FOR YOU!!!

Take a role of a true general of a real army. Join the battle, capture enemies’ castles and raise the power of your army. Lead your clan to the victory!

KEY FEATURES:
- Plenty of maps, each with a unique tactical objective.
- Eye-candy graphics.
- You can easily control your army.
- User-friendly and dynamic gameplay.

CHOOSE YOUR GENERAL!
Each character has unique skills efficient for each specific situation.

UPGRADE YOUR CHARACTERS’ SKILLS
and conquer the land faster!

COLLECT ARTIFACTS!
Assemble them in a set. Artefacts improves the strength of your army.

USE ANYTHING YOU CAN TO MAKE YOUR ARMY STRONGER!!!

Game Page: http://foggybus.com/battletime
YouTube Page: https://www.youtube.com/c/foggybus-battletime-game
Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/battletime-game-1609695165962785
Google+ Page: https://plus.google.com/+foggybus-battletime-game/about
